favourite.article: I choose to be a living overcomer, Be a person not ashamed to be a Jesus lover.
To be today's age-turner. Change the world for the better, even if the majority of the people are against your ideas!
Love this song!
Amen! Lord I will give myself to You to turn this age and for Your return!
Thanks for this amazing song!
I will choose to be a living overcomer. Praise the Lord!
I am not ashamed to be a Jesus lover!
Amen. I will choose to be an overcomer.
I give myself to You, to turn this age!
Shoutout to Dillon Yang! He introduced this song to me and I love listening to it. Praise the Lord!
I will choose to be a living overcomer, Be a person not ashamed to be a Jesus lover!
Amen! We are not ashamed to be Jesus lovers!
Wonderful song.
Praise the Lord! May we all choose to be living overcomers!
Amen Lord! Amen! Cause this fire to burn in us every day! Have mercy, Lord!
I choose to be a living overcomer, Be a person not ashamed to be a Jesus lover. Amen, Praise the Lord!
背景詩歌
I choose to be a living overcomer! Just a simple enjoyer, crazy lover of Jesus, one of God's age-turners!
I will choose to be a loving overcome. Praise the Lord and be a living overcomer. Keep my burning spirit burning! Praise the Lord!
I will choose to be a living overcomer! Be a person not ashamed to be a Jesus lover!
Praise God for this song!
Sorry it's better in the last line of the 2 Chorus Por Tu regreso Dios, a Ti me doy and Para la_era cambiar, a Ti me doy

Translation to Spanish: Noé con su vida la era cambió Cuando gracia halló de Dios. Contra_el mundo con valor lo enfrentó Y el arca_edificó. coro ¿Tu escogerías ser un vencedor Ser una persona que no teme_amar a Cristo Que come del árbol y bebe el agua viva? ¿Tu escogerías ser un vencedor Que deja_a tras el mundo y así cambiar la era? Por Tu regreso Dios, me doy a Ti. El llamado de Dios a Moisés llegó Y la era él cambió. Compañero de Dios y de Su mover Fue humilde, sabio y fiel. Como un sacerdote de Dios fue Samuel Y absoluto para Él. Del pecado, mundo_y muerte salvo fue Nazareo dio su ser. Daniel con sus compañeros se_apartó La Palabra él comió. Con espíritu de oración a Dios Por Su pueblo_intercedió. Yo escojo ser un vencedor viviente Ser una persona que no teme_amar a Cristo Que come del árbol y bebe el agua viva. Yo daré mi vida para ser un vencedor Con una celestial visión y_espíritu ferviente. Para la_era cambiar, me doy a Ti.
Has someone translated this one in Spanish?
We are singing now! And so good.
Lord may we be Your age turners! Lord we want to be an overcomer! Lord Jesus You are our goal! Our life! Our light! Our All Sufficient God!
Keep my spirit burning Lord. I would choose to be an overcomer to turn this age and for Your return. I would never be ashamed to be Jesus lover.
Lord Jesus. I give myself to You to be an overcomer.
Lord, we choose to be the overcomers with You as the Spirit burning within us. Make us those who can turn this age and bring You back.
May the Lord cause us to be today's age-turner.
Bring us in the subjective experience of not to be ashame to be identified as Jesus lovers. Keep us in Your realm, only in You we can overcome everything.
Keep my flaming spirit burning!
I will choose to be a living overcomer, keep my flaming spirit burning Lord Jesus! Thank You Lord for the Overcoming Life.
Oh Lord, I choose to be a living overcomer. I am not ashamed to be Jesus lovers. Make us those who live to turn this age.
Oh Lord we give ourselves to You to turn this age! Lord we choose to be Your loving overcomers! Oh Praise the Lord saints we can be His age turners!!!
Enjoyed this very much last week with the YP at Truth School at Camp Engedi, Big Bear, CA. - may we be those who eat the tree of life, and drink the living water!
Hallelujah! Lord be in my presence so that I may choose to be a living overcomer. I will not be ashamed to be a Jesus lover. May we keep are spirits burning. I love You Lord. Amen.
Yes Lord I choose to be a LIVING overcomer! Make me a person who is not ashamed to be a Jesus lover!!
What a wonderful song, full of today's sentiment and need!

Yes I Choose to Be An Overcomer but I can't do it on my own. Lord Jesus I want to take You as my Overcoming one, in my inner being. Thank You Lord for loving us first. We Love You Lord Jesus! You're so sweet. Amen!

To be an overcomer is a choice to make in Christ bountiful supply as our very grace by the Father's love and through the Spirit anointing..consider our ways of living for us to be such one who turned this age.
I will choose to ba an overcomer! Amen!
We choose to be living overcomers! We are not ashamed to be Jesus lovers!
Lord Jesus, I will choose to be a living overcomer to turn this age. Gain my heart to love You.

LORD, Thank YOU for Noah, Moses, Samuel, Daniel representing YOU on earth. TODAY, Take & Seal us, 1 Cor. 1:30, YOUR corporate vessel, absolutely one spirit with YOU, we say Amen to our Beloved God, YOUR Kingdom come where we are, YOUR will be done where YOU Send us on earth. Rev. 22:17-21:):)
Lord, end this age! Make this the generation that sees Your return!
Lord, I give myself to You to turn this age!

To turn this age, God needs our willing consecration. Will you be one of God's age turner? Would you choose to be a living overcomer? Let us all declare "I will choose to be a living overcomer, I give myself to You, to turn this age."
Lord, cause us to leave the world and consecrate. To be today’s age-turner! :)
Saints, we can choose to be a living overcomer. Yes, we have our needs but God's need is more urgent than ours. Lord, we give ourselves to You to turn this age.
I give myself to You, to turn this age!
Amen! O Lord Jesus! How precious are You!! Saving us from death, the world and sin! Hallelujah!! Thank You, our Bread of Life, our Living Water!! May we be Your living overcomers!
Lord, I want to be an overcomer! Gain me today!
"He who testifies these things says, Yes, I come quickly. Amen. Come, Lord Jesus!" -Revelation 22:20- Yes! I'll choose to be a living overcomer!

Amen LORD Cast Fire on earth 2015 we pray through the Blood of YOUR covenant in one accord! Thank You for each flame in this Fire, Burn Brightly we pray for each YP, college age flame:):) Thank You for Sending us to the earth, Go, Father, Let the earth hear YOUR voice! we loose all our goings unto YOUR Coming, Come, our Lovely Beloved Master our LOVE we want YOU our God:):) Exodus 25:1-9 RcVBible w/FtNt.
Praise the Lord, I am a person not ashamed to be a Jesus lover!
Oh Lord Jesus we love You! We are meant to turn the age! I really enjoyed this song. I listen to it over and over again! :)
Lord, we want to be the overcomers that will turn the age today. Grace us more with Yourself Lord! Amen.
Lord, make us Your living overcomers!
We learned this song at tonight's young people's meeting! We really enjoyed this song! Praise the Lord!

Lord, make us today’s age-turner! But to Him who is able to guard you from stumbling and to set you before His glory without blemish in exultation, to the only God our Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord be glory, majesty, might, and authority before all time and now and unto all eternity. Amen. (Jude 1:24-26 RcV)
Lord Jesus, I give myself to You to turn this age. I give myself to You for Your return. Gain us for Your move!
Dear Lord, gain Your age turners.
I will choose to be an overcomer! Praise You Lord we can make this choice! Gain many overcomers during this National College Training.
Lord Jesus, bless this upcoming National College Training, we give ourselves to be Your living overcomers! Keep my spirit burning to turn this age, make me one that is absolute for You!!
Lord, make us those who would love You!
